attributes.action: resign and hand himself over to the relevant authorities to answer in a recognised court of international law to charges of war crimes and breaches of the universal declaration of human rights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Blair and others have been accused of multiple counts of breaching international law and human rights legislations, we the undersigned believe the PM should make himself fully accountable - if he has nothing to hide and a clear conscience he will have no fear.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
